lead_paragraph: Some opponents of Donald J. Trump are seeking recounts in Wisconsin, Michigan and Pennsylvania, states where his margin of victory was extremely thin.

byline.contributor: Trip Gabriel contributed reporting from New York.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Officials Stand by Vote Despite Fears
headline.main: U.S. Officials Defend Integrity of Vote, Despite Hacking Fears

snippet: Some opponents of Donald J. Trump are seeking recounts in Wisconsin, Michigan and Pennsylvania, states where his margin of victory was extremely thin....
abstract: Obama administration says it has concluded presidential election accurately reflects will of American people; administration's statement alludes to concerns about attempts by Russia to undermine election, but says there has been no indication that results were tampered with via hacking; statement comes even as liberal opponents of Pres-elect Donald Trump have sought recounts in some states.
